reqs: Pre-reqs: One of GEOG 102, GEOB 102. (or first-year science.)
description: Physical principles underlying weather and climates. Thermal, moisture and wind climates at scales from valleys to the globe. Daily weather, air pollution, global change. Credit will be granted for only one of GEOB 200, GEOB 204, GEOG 200, GEOG 204, or AGRO 244.
